ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Biztalk vs REST?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Stefan. ... Or Biztalk is a stack of functionality on top of the basic connectivity? OK, thanks for the perspective. regards -- Dave Pawson XSLT XSL-FO FAQ.

Hi Stefan.

On 26/08/06, Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> wrote:
> This seems to be apples and oranges (again).
>
>  AFAICT, BizTalk is an EAI solution, offering out-of-the-box support
>  and a graphical user interface for creating orchestrations,
>  transformation pipelines and so on.
...
>  So in other words: The two seem to be orthogonal to me.

Or Biztalk is a stack of functionality on top of the basic connectivity?

OK, thanks for the perspective.

regards

-- 
Dave Pawson
XSLT XSL-FO FAQ.
http://www.dpawson.co.uk
